channel.title: Zenith title help
channel.description: It says this is paradoxtm's title etc... Why can't I use the title? I set myself to owner and everything... If anyone can please help me figure out this problem I'd appreciate it. Thanks. :D

item.title: Zenith title help
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

ParadoxTM:

Also do you know how to make titles for like donators up? Or mods up?

were about to find out later on when i figure out how to work my sprites editor. also i got dragonbone 10% working lol

item.description:

xplode:

long story short… change the title 31 to 35 or 100… compile… and re-run, simple as that.

I did and it didn’t work… Unless the title that was for owner is The Awesome…

item.title: Zenith title help
item.dc:creator: @ParadoxTM ParadoxTM
item.description:
@ParadoxTM wrote:

[quote=“Rotavele, post:2, topic:454113”][quote author=ParadoxTM link=topic=556986.msg4076287#msg4076287 date=1344876354]
It says this is paradoxtm’s title etc… Why can’t I use the title? I set myself to owner and everything… If anyone can please help me figure out this problem I’d appreciate it. Thanks.
[/quote]

I also built my server off of a Zenith Scape source. For title’s what you want to do is use the command ::title, Well for you it will be in the console (hit ~) and type title ___. Then after you learned the command, you need to find the I.D. of the title you want. Then for example, put in ::title 14 (War-Chief if I recall correctly)[/quote]

Lul… No… I know how to do that… I mean I do ~title 31 because that’s the owners title… And it says “That is owner paradoxtm’s title, don’t mess with it or he’ll jack you up” Why can’t I use it? I have owner rights…

Read full topic

item.title: Zenith title help
item.dc:creator: @Rotavele Rotavele
item.description:
@Rotavele wrote:

ParadoxTM:

It says this is paradoxtm’s title etc… Why can’t I use the title? I set myself to owner and everything… If anyone can please help me figure out this problem I’d appreciate it. Thanks.

I also built my server off of a Zenith Scape source. For title’s what you want to do is use the command ::title, Well for you it will be in the console (hit ~) and type title ___. Then after you learned the command, you need to find the I.D. of the title you want. Then for example, put in ::title 14 (War-Chief if I recall correctly)

If you want to find more commands, feel free to join my server and and look at all the command list’s I have

Read full topic
